author: Redacción Semana
title: Atención: Petro se reunió con el papa Francisco y le propuso realizar un ciclo de los diálogos de paz con el ELN en el Vaticano
text: El presidente Gustavo Petro le propuso al papa Francisco que un ciclo de diálogos con la guerrilla del ELN se lleve a cabo en el Vaticano. su encuentro bilateral de este viernes que tuvo lugar en la Santa Sede. El papa Francisco y Petro hablaron de la paz en Colombia, la situación política de Nicaragua por el régimen de Daniel Ortega y otros asuntos humanitarios. Al salir de esta cita, el mandatario aseguró que le planteó esa iniciativa al jerarca de la Iglesia católica.Tras el encuentro, el mandatario dio unas declaraciones para los medios en las que reafirmó que hablaron sobre la paz “buscando una posición mucho más activa tanto del Estado Vaticano como de la Iglesia católica en el proceso de paz de Colombia”, detalló el presidente Petro.Además, aseguró que “es posible que hagamos una ronda, ya se hablará con el ELN, acá”, al proponerle al pontífice que el Vaticano sea sede de un ciclo de diálogo entre el Gobierno colombiano y esa guerrilla.Sobre los avances de las conversaciones y una posible prolongación del cese al fuego con el ELN, el presidente Petro recordó que “son dos partes. Aquí no podemos hablar a nombre de una. Todo lo que pueda suceder con el ELN tiene que ser con las dos partes”. Asimismo, sostuvo que “el papa está de acuerdo en que busquemos caminos de paz para Colombia”. La audiencia privada entre el presidente y el sumo pontífice tuvo lugar en la madrugada de este viernes (en hora colombiana) y en ella el mandatario buscó una posición más profunda del Estado Vaticano y la Iglesia en la paz de Colombia, paso que toma relevancia si se tiene en cuenta que las conexiones religiosas que ha tenido el ELN.Gustavo Petro enfatizó que “la Iglesia católica ha sido un gran apoyo en Colombia a todos los procesos de paz y lo es en este momento con relación al proceso de paz con el ELN y con el EMC. El Estado Vaticano, como instancia nacional, territorial, estatal, puede ser el escenario de una ronda de negociaciones. A mí me interesaría mucho que la siguiente o la que puede establecerse con el ELN se pueda desarrollar aquí por muchas razones que tienen que ver con la historia misma del ELN”.Consultado sobre la situación del secuestro, dado que una de las condiciones que pusieron los negociadores a los elenos es que dejen de ejercer esa actividad delictiva , Gustavo Petro sostuvo que “con el ELN ese es el tema central”. El papa Francisco se ha reunido con funcionarios del Gobierno Petro en tres ocasiones en las últimas semanas. En la Santa Sede también estuvieron la vicepresidenta, Francia Márquez, y la primera dama, Verónica Alcocer. El presidente aseguró: “Nosotros tenemos una enorme simpatía con el papa, hemos coincidido en el punto de vista político, no solamente religioso, en sus encíclicas Laudato si fue absolutamente inspirador al rededor de este tema del relacionamiento del ser humano con la naturaleza. Y la última, Fratelli tutti, que prácticamente propone, como nosotros defendemos en Colombia, la salida de un régimen que llamamos neoliberal, que ha debilitado los Estados, que ha entregado, entonces, las sociedades a controles mafiosos en toda América del Sur, y que ha llenado a América del Sur de desigualdad social”.Gustavo Petro habló de trazar una alianza con el Vaticano para los asuntos de cambio climático y dio a conocer que también le planteó la situación de Palestina suscitada por la guerra contra Israel.El sexto ciclo de diálogos entre el Gobierno y el ELN tendrá lugar a finales de este mes de enero y sobre la mesa está la solicitud que se le hizo a esa guerrilla para que deje de utilizar el secuestro como una actividad delictiva con fines económicos, además de la liberación de todos los secuestrados.

author: 卓创资讯
title: 炭黑季度总结：二季度弱势运行是主基调，三季度涨跌幅或收窄
text:
导语：2025年二季度炭黑市场价格呈现下行-小涨-小跌趋势，整体均价重心较一季度下移887元/吨附近，其成本面下滑叠加供需矛盾拖累是主因，而原料油价格趋弱的主因亦是生产企业供需博弈下利润被压缩导致。展望三季度，供需博弈的持续叠加原料油涨跌幅受限，炭黑市场价格涨跌波动幅度或预期收窄。
　　 二季度回顾：下行至低位后区间小幅波动，行业盈利空间被挤压
　　二季度炭黑市场价格呈现下行至低位后小幅回涨后再小跌趋势。截至6月30日，山东地区炭黑N330市场价格运行区间为6200-6400元/吨(非轮胎、承兑、含税、送到)，均价较一季度下滑887元/吨，跌幅为11.8%；同比去年二季度均价下滑1708元/吨，跌幅为20.5%。
　　 二季度炭黑市场运行表现有：
　　第一，4月份部分下游用户前期备货炭黑库存尚未消耗完毕，市场新单商谈偏冷清，叠加贸易战关税政策对炭黑产业链交投心态影响较大，炭黑企业出货缓慢导致库存累积至偏高水平；同时深加工及炭黑企业承接高价原料油积极性不高，市场存低价备货原料油意向下压制油价导致原料油价格下滑。供需与成本双利空下炭黑市场价格承压下行1000元/吨至上半年新低点，炭黑企业利润水平基本进入偏低甚至亏损阶段；
　　第二，进入5月中旬，原料油价格下行至低位后市场低价抄底原料油意向增加，叠加贸易商心态支撑，原料油价格止跌小幅反弹，同时轮胎等制品企业及贸易商入市抄底积极性提升，炭黑企业库存水平下滑明显后支撑炭黑市场止跌小幅反弹400元/吨附近，但市场高价成交不畅，下游用户多消耗前期低价库存为主，炭黑企业基本亏损交付低价订单为主；
　　第三，5月中下旬后炭黑行业开工负荷水平恢复至高位，同时下游采购积极性再次回落，炭黑企业库存进入回涨阶段，叠加深加工盈利空间收窄后也抵触高价原料油，原料油价格呈现回落，进一步导致炭黑市场价格下行400元/吨回到低点。
　　供需差与炭黑生产企业库存、价格走势均与历史规律性呈现差异性，导致价格跌幅扩大
　　以历史市场运行规律来看，供需差与炭黑企业库存走势较为吻合，但与炭黑市场价格基本呈现负相关走势，主要是因为供需差下滑阶段说明市场需求量大于供应量，炭黑企业也较为容易进入降库阶段，进而导致市场价格容易上涨；反之亦然。但从近两年炭黑市场运行情况来看，这种规律性基本逐渐消失，尤其是进入2025年运行趋势基本表现为市场供需差扩大阶段炭黑企业库存累积较快，炭黑市场价格跌幅容易扩大；供需差下滑阶段炭黑企业库存却很难有明显跌势，价格也很难上涨甚至下滑。
　　从二季度情况来看，4月份炭黑行业供需差呈现下滑趋势，市场处于需求增量大于供应增量阶段，但是4月份炭黑生产企业库存上涨，说明下游用户消耗的多数为3月中下旬囤的低价炭黑，炭黑企业新单承接情况不理想导致库存增加，进而导致5月上旬市场价格下行至低位；5月上旬市场再次存集中低价备货行为带动炭黑企业接单情况好转，5月份炭黑生产企业库存下滑明显，炭黑企业进入短期库存消耗阶段，但反观5月份供需差却呈现增长趋势，说明5月份整体市场供应增量大于需求增量，实际炭黑出货量多由生产企业库存传导至社会及下游库存，而非实际生产消耗完毕，所以5月中下旬市场挺价阶段导致炭黑企业新单承接有限再次进入累库阶段，6月份炭黑行业开工负荷高位下供应增量大于需求增量，行业供需差与企业库存双增长趋势下进一步导致了6月份炭黑市场价格的下行。
　　展望三季度，供需关系仍是制约炭黑议价及承接原料油能力的主因，或导致炭黑市场价格涨跌幅收窄
　　供需面来看，从2025年整体供需情况来看，预测2025年前三季度供应净增量仅为2.93万吨，抛除期初库存来看整体净供需水平相对较为平衡，但市场供应量增加37.54万吨，基本是因为2025年1月初炭黑行业期初库存高位拖累。2023年四季度轮胎出口订单承接情况较好，对炭黑需求旺盛，炭黑实际出货量大部分直接用于下游生产，所以2024年初行业期初社会库存水平不高；但反观2024年四季度轮胎内外需求均较为平淡，轮胎市场开工水平也低于2023年四季度，导致2025年初炭黑生产虽然处于降库阶段，但实际出货量并未用于下游生产，2025年初整体社会库存多为提前低价囤货，叠加2024年炭黑行业新增产能的释放，2025年初市场供应充裕炭黑社会库存高位。年初库存水平较高传导至2025年，前三季度虽然供应净增量仅为2.93万吨，但受年初库存高位拖累，整体市场年内都处于供应偏充裕的状态，导致炭黑市场价格易跌难涨，行业利润水平下滑明显。
　　成本面来看，三季度焦化企业存减产预期但尚有利润下预计减产幅度不大，但高温煤焦油进口量预计呈现增加预期，叠加上半年煤焦油贸易商库存的释放，三季度煤焦油整体供应面尚可；深加工及炭黑行业虽然需求较为稳定对煤焦油底部形成支撑，但利润空间薄弱甚至亏损及心态偏弱下三季度对高价原料承接能力下滑，导致煤焦油价格顶部或受限，进而导致煤焦油三季度整体上下波动幅度或在300元/吨附近，原料油振幅的收窄一定程度上也导致炭黑市场价格振幅的收窄。
　　综合来看，7月份半钢轮胎开工下滑或进一步拖累炭黑市场需求，当前部分主流炭黑企业或逐渐存减产行为，7月份预期供需面双跌，7月中上旬原料油下滑将导致炭黑价格弱势波动，但亏损承压下炭黑企业仍存守价意向，继续让利空间偏小；7月中下旬原料油价格存上行预期下或带动市场回暖；进入8月份轮胎市场开工存恢复空间，炭黑企业7月份减产运行下库存水平或有所下滑，叠加成本面均价存小增预期，炭黑均价存上涨预期但空间受限；进入9月中旬后中秋节及国庆节假期临近，轮胎厂9月中下旬后将存减产计划，对炭黑采购量预期将下滑，叠加深加工存秋季检修减产预期，届时炭黑市场成本面支撑也将减弱，市场继续上涨或呈现乏力。
topics: Economy, Business and Finance->market and exchange
Economy, Business and Finance->business reporting and performance

author: Roberta Souza
title: AI Wars! Anthropic Introduces OpenAI Rival with Advanced Performance. Will this be the end of ChatGPT?
text:
Claude 3.7 Sonnet: New AI model promises to “reason” better than the famous and classic ChatGPT!
A startup anthropic, a direct rival of OpenAI, has just launched its latest new model of artificial intelligence: Claude 3.7 Sonnet. The difference? The promise of reason better, follow instructions more accurately and be much more efficient for programmers, according to the Uol website.
Hybrid AI: Fast thinking and enhanced reasoning
Second Jared Kaplan, co-founder of Anthropic, the Claude 3.7 Sonnet goes beyond quick answers. He is a model hybrid, Ou seja, can give instant answers or “think” for longer to solve complex questions, analyze data and write more sophisticated texts.
But what changes in practice?
✔️ More intelligence in programming: Best for developers to code.
✔️ Increased accuracy: Follows instructions more exactly.
✔️ Advanced reasoning: Answers difficult questions with improved logic.
✔️ Long and detailed texts: Greater ability to organize and structure complex content.
OpenAI vs Anthropic: The New AI Battle
In recent months, the dispute between Claude e Chat GPT became even more intense. OpenAI launched GPT-4o, a model that promises to be more human by demonstrating the steps of his “thought”.
Already Anthropic innovates in AI autonomy with the function “Computer Use”, allowing Claude access the internet, browse websites and even use programs like a human being.
The companies Google, Meta and the Chinese DeepSeek are also racing to master generative AI. The model DeepSeek R1, recently launched, promises very high quality at a lower cost, challenging the giants in the sector.
topics: Science and Technology->information technology and computer science
Economy, Business and Finance->products and services
Economy, Business and Finance->computing and information technology

author: Michael Hogan
title: Loving Traitors? Here are eight murderous party games to play at home
text:
The BBC’s binge-worthy reality gameshow The Traitors is back for a second series and once again, millions of us are obsessed with the battle of wits between the crime-cracking Faithfuls and the murderous cape-clad Traitors.
Not to mention host Claudia Winkleman’s tweed-chic outfits as she presides over psychological warfare in that enviable Scottish Highlands castle.
Since The Traitors is essentially a parlour game on steroids – the original Dutch format, De Verraders, was loosely based on party game Mafia – it’s possible to recreate its bluffs and betrayals in the comfort of your own home.
Here’s how to play your own version. A black fringe and fingerless gloves are strictly optional…
1. Mafia The Russian social deduction game, devised by Moscow University psychology professor Dimitry Davidoff in 1987, pits innocent civilians against the evil Mafiosi hidden in their midst. As with The Traitors, the baddies covertly kill at night .
During the day phase, surviving civilians debate and vote to eliminate suspects. It needs at least four players but the more the merrier, meaning roles such as detective, doctor and mayor can be added to the basic civilians versus mobsters set-up.
Russian social deduction game Mafia needs at least four players Credit : LightField Studios Inc./Alamy Stock Photo Playing cards can be used by simply assigning them to the different roles, shuffling and picking at random. Games can take anything from 15 minutes to an hour, depending on the number of players and the speed of each day and night cycle.
Variants include Werewolf (see below), a Spaghetti Western version called Bang!, The Resistance (set amid a war between a totalitarian government and rebel groups) and the Arthurian-themed Avalon.
How to start: Either buy a set of Mafia cards and instruction booklet (£14.99), or use a standard deck of playing cards and search online (look on wikihow.com/Play-Mafia for a how-to guide).
2. Werewolf The American interactive fiction writer Andrew Plotkin reinvented Mafia as Werewolf in 1997, believing the gangland theme lacked universal resonance and werewolves also worked with the concept of a hidden enemy who looked innocuous during daytime.
This time, medieval townsfolk try to purge their village of deadly lupine shapeshifters. It’s similar to Mafia, so can also be played with a deck of cards, or even scraps of paper, but works best with seven or more players, so you can have a moderator, a seer, a doctor, two werewolves and some villagers. Werewolf involves more open discussion, so is arguably closer to The Traitors in format. Feel free to add DIY howling-at-the-moon spooky sound effects and dramatic deaths.
How to start: Buy a set of Werewolf cards (£10.39; playwerewolf.co ).
3. Secret Hitler Just in case mafiosi and werewolves weren’t sinister enough for your tastes, this variation on the theme – launched in 2016 after a crowdfunding campaign – has players assume the roles of liberals and fascists in the Reichstag of the Weimar Republic, with one player becoming Hitler himself.
During a game of Secret Hitler, party-aligned teams take part in elections Party-aligned teams take part in elections, then compete to advance their agenda, voting “Ja!” or “Nein!” to policy proposals. But who is Hitler? And can they be assassinated before ascending to power? Yes, it’s Nazi fun for all the family.
How to start: Buy the beautifully designed boxed version (£35 ) or play for free by downloading the rules and components online, then getting busy with a printer and scissors.
4. Among Us This is an online multiplayer version for the gaming generation, released in 2018 and influenced by John Carpenter’s horror film The Thing, as well as Mafia and Werewolf. It’s set in space, with players represented by colourful cartoon astronauts, assigned the role of Crewmates or Impostors.
The former must complete tasks while identifying and voting out the latter before they’re killed. Among Us saw a huge surge in popularity during lockdown, subsequently winning a slew of gaming awards in 2020 and 2021. Updates with new maps and outfits are still being released.
How to start: Download for free from Apple App Store or Google Play.
5. The Traitors online game Would you prefer to be a Faithful... or a Traitor? Credit : Mark Mainz/Studio Lambert/BBC/PA Wire Launching on Friday night after the third episode airs – complete with an agonising cliffhanger – this official prediction game enables players to earn points by correctly guessing who will be murdered, who will be banished and who will make it to the series’ endgame, with bonus questions along the way.
A little like fantasy football, there’s an overall leaderboard for all Traitors fans. You can also form separate mini-leagues with friends, family or colleagues. The show has also inspired its own branded board game (£21.99).
How to start: Web, tablet and mobile versions are free at bbc.co.uk/traitors .
6. Town of Salem Another online multiplayer affair, with strategic and deceptive as well as deductive elements. First launched a decade ago, it sees locals and gangsters battle for control of the witch trial-era town by unmasking and lynching each other
A sequel, the imaginatively titled Town of Salem 2, was released last year with the Mafia replaced by the Coven. Either version is playable on your phone, as is Among Us, so you can also liven up your commute with a spot of sleuthing and backstabbing.
How to start: Download for free from Apple App Store or Google Play.
7. Cluedo The quintessentially British whodunit game, devised in 1942 by musician Anthony E Pratt during air raids on his home city of Birmingham. Players assume the role of one of the six suspects and turn detective to work out who murdered the victim, in which room and with what weapon.
Was it Miss Scarlet in the library with lead piping? Or Colonel Mustard with the candlestick in the billiard room? A timeless way to live out your Agatha Christie fantasies (and quite possibly fall out with your family).
How to start: Dig out your dusty old Waddingtons version from a cupboard or grudgingly buy a new set (£14.99).
8. Wink Murder The most lo-fi and accessible version of the lot. Just try not to develop a nervous twitch mid-game. One player is assigned the role of detective and gets sent out of the room, while the others decide who will be the murderer.
When the detective is called back in, the murderer starts killing by surreptitiously winking at their fellow players, who must die ostentatiously. The detective gets three chances to guess the culprit. Variations include “Deadly Handshake”, “Lonely Ghost” and, for the particularly bloodthirsty, “Slit Throat”.
How to start: Simply sit in a circle and let the lethal winking commence.
Related Topics Claudia Winkleman, BBC, Gaming
